title: Zelenskyy holds meeting of Staff to discuss Bakhmut and other hot spots
description: On 7 December, President Volodymyr Zelenskyy held a meeting of the Staff of the Supreme Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, at which he spoke about the situation in the hottest areas of the front and the situation in the energy sector.

title: Zelenskyy: 10 people killed in Russian attack on Kurakhove in Donetsk Oblast
description:
Ten people have been killed in an attack by the Russian army on the city of Kurakhove, Donetsk Oblast. 
Source: Zelenskyy's evening address 
Quote from Zelenskyy: "Today (7 December) the Russian army carried out a strike on Kurakhove.

title: Kuleba asks Borrell to add Russian missile production to new EU sanctions list
description: Dmytro Kuleba, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of Ukraine, believes that the ninth package of sanctions against Russia proposed by the European Commission contains a number of important elements, but it should also include restrictions on Russia's missile programme.

title: Ukraine's MFA asked Borrell to impose sanctions on Russia's missile production
1888 settlements liberated, same number is still occupied – Zelenskyy
description:
The Ukrainian forces have liberated 1,888 settlements, but almost the same number of cities and villages are still occupied. 
Source: Volodymyr Zelenskyy, the President of Ukraine, in an address to Robert F.

title: Georgia's Prime Minister rules out military assistance to Ukraine
Russians shell Pechenihy in Kharkiv Oblast with S-300
description:
The Russians used S-300 missiles to shell the settlement of Pechenihy in Kharkiv Oblast in the evening on 7 December. 
Source: Kyrylo Tymoshenko, Deputy Head of the President's Office; Oleksandr Husarov, Head of Pechenihy settlement, on Telegram 
Quote: "The occupiers launched an attack on the settlement of Pechenihy.

title: Governor of Belgorod Oblast reports about missiles shot down
description:
Viacheslav Gladkov, the Governor of Belgorod Oblast in Russia, claims that the Russian air defence forces shot down missiles over one of the villages in the oblast in the evening of 7 December. 
Source: Nastoyashchii Gladkov Telegram channel 
Quote: "Our air defence has shot down missiles above the village of Kuleshovka in the Krasnogvardeysky district.

title: Satellite images show that up to 10 bombers disappeared from Russian Dyagilevo airbase
description:
Up to 10 Tu-22M bombers have disappeared from the Russian Dyagilevo military airbase in Ryazan Oblast. 
Source: Mark Krutov, journalist of the Russian editorial office of Radio Free Europe/Radio Liberty, on Twitter 
Details: Krutov published the pictures taken on 7 December.

title: 4 police officers killed and 4 injured in mine blast in Kherson Oblast
description:
Four Ukrainian police officers were killed and four others were injured when Russian mines exploded in Kherson Oblast on 7 December. 
Source: Ihor Klymenko, Head of the National Police of Ukraine, on Facebook 
Quote: "The staff of the National Police of Ukraine lost four colleagues from the Cherkasy Oblast Police today.

title: Civilian targets in Korosten, Zhytomyr Oblast suffer from Russian attacks – General Staff
description: Russian forces attacked Korosten in Zhytomyr Oblast, a number of settlements in Zaporizhzhia Oblast, as well as the city of Kurakhove in Donetsk Oblast on the 287th day of the Russian full-scale war against Ukraine.

title: Putin on nuclear threat: We are not crazy, but Russia's strategy is counter-strike
description:
Russian President Vladimir Putin has made it clear that Moscow may use nuclear weapons as a "retaliatory strike", but hopes to use them as a deterrent to other countries. 
Source: Kremlin-aligned news outlet RIA Novosti, quoting Putin 
Quote: "Regarding the threat of nuclear war.

title: Russian invaders start to take away property in south of Ukraine of those who evacuated
description: Russian occupiers have put up posters in the town of Prymorsk, Zaporizhzhia Oblast, saying that property owners have to apply to the occupation administration for documents, or the property will be recognised as ownerless and taken away.

title: Putin admits Russian troops are surrendering positions, but "not en masse"
description:
Russian President Vladimir Putin has said that the Russian military sometimes left their positions, but this was not a problem for Russia. 
Source: Kremlin-aligned news outlet RIA Novosti, quoting Putin 
Details: Putin said that in Ukraine, they "shoot people on the spot" and carry out "mass shootings publicly in front of the lines".

title: Putin claims seizure of Azov territories "significant result" of war for Russia
description: Russian President Vladimir Putin has acknowledged that the seizure of new territories is a significant result of the so-called "special operation" in Ukraine [the official term used by Russians to describe the ongoing war with Ukraine - ed.

title: Putin claims 150,000 Russian conscripts already sent to Ukraine, additional recruitment "makes no sense"
description:
Russian President Vladimir Putin has said that there was no point in additional draft in Russia, as allegedly 150,000 Russian conscripts have been sent to Ukraine. 
Source: Kremlin-aligned news outlet RIA Novosti, quoting Putin 
Quote from Putin: "As for possible conscription, and rumours about it.

title: Putin claims Russia fights for its national interests using "peaceful means"
description:
Russian dictator Vladimir Putin has said that his country would fight for its national interests by "peaceful means", but if it failed, it would do so "by all available means". 
Source: Kremlin-aligned news outlet RIA Novosti 
Quote: "Russia will continue the consistent struggle for its national interests, initially by peaceful means, but if that fails, by all available means.

title: Russia hits city market and petrol stations, killing 8 people
description:
The Russian military hit a market, a bus station, petrol stations and residential buildings in the city of Kurakhove, Donetsk Oblast, on 7 December. At least eight civilians were killed in the attack. 
Source: Pavlo Kyrylenko, Head of the Donetsk Oblast Military Administration, on Telegram; Kyrylo Tymoshenko, Deputy Head of the President's Office, on Telegram; Volodymyr Zelenskyy on Telegram 
Quote: "A powerful strike in Kurakhove.

title: Why Ukrainian democracy is worth the investment
description:
The 15th annual meeting on the implementation of the Declaration of Principles for International Election Observation (DoP) is taking place in the European Parliament in Brussels on December, 6-8.  
The event engages organizations acting in the field of international election observation.

title: Deserter with light machine gun: Wagner Group announces start of their own investigation
description: The operative team of the Wagner Group PMC [private military company] will conduct its investigation to find out whether it is true that the deserter who opened fire in the Russian city of Novoshakhtinsk served in its ranks.
